name: International Conference on Software Engineering and Automation
content: International Conference on Software Engineering and Automation (SEAU 2022) November 12 \~ 13, 2022, Chennai, India https://cst2022.org/seau/index Scope & Topics International Conference on Software Engineering and Automation (SEAU 2022) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Software Engineering and Automation. The goal of this Conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding Modern software engineering concepts and establishing new collaborations in these areas. Topics of interest • Advanced Topics in Software Engineering • Agile and Lean Software Development • IoT software engineering • Knowledge-based Systems and Formal Methods • Languages and Formal Methods • Managing Software Projects • Multimedia and Visual Software Engineering • Open Source Software • Quality Management • Service-oriented Software Engineering (SOSE) • Software Engineering Decision Making • Software Engineering for Big Data • Software Engineering for Machine Learning • Software Engineering Practice • Software Maintenance and Testing • Software Performance • Software Process • Software Security • Web Engineering • Web-based Education Systems and Learning Applications • Automated usability and user experience testing • Automation and control systems • Formal methods and theories for testing and test automation • Natural Language Processing (NLP) Based Test Automation • Network Automation • Computer Vision & Automation • Robotics, Automation and Signal Processing • Security Automation • Software Test Automation • Test automation of large, complex system Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by October 29, 2022\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. Important Dates Submission Deadline : October 29, 2022 Authors Notification : November 07, 2022 Final Manuscript Due : November 09, 2022 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : seauconf@yahoo.com or seau@cst2022.org
